creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: large masted ship with two European figures at center of bowl; pairs of European men in rich brocades alternating with cartouches of smaller ships and decorations against a floral background on insides; peony design alternating with cartouches of European man and boy on outside
medium: Imari ware; porcelain with overglaze enamels
title: Bowl with Ships and Dutchmen
